医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
韩国发酵食品大酱有望缓解更年期症状研究比较了传统韩国大酱与商业韩国大酱对更年期症状的影响，发现含有大量有益微生物的传统大酱在减轻这些症状以及改善心血管和肠道健康方面更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Korean-fermented-food-Doenjang-shows-promise-in-alleviating-menopausal-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Korean-fermented-food-Doenjang-shows-promise-in-alleviating-menopausal-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc16afa3-09df-4575-a6ed-9813652d15be Sun, 21 Apr 2024 23:11:00 -0400 Korean fermented food Doenjang shows promise in alleviating menopausal symptoms
研究通过 DNA 变化将空气污染与结直肠癌风险增加联系起来研究人员利用大规模研究和孟德尔随机化来证明环境污染对中国结直肠癌死亡率和发病率的影响，揭示了空气污染如何通过表观遗传变化增加结直肠癌 (CRC) 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-colorectal-cancer-risk-through-DNA-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-colorectal-cancer-risk-through-DNA-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=212473ca-562d-4b9b-86ad-ba4e58472a6d Sun, 21 Apr 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Study links air pollution to increased colorectal cancer risk through DNA changes
气候变化预计将导致中国心血管死亡人数激增eBioMedicine 的研究人员预测，气候变化将显着增加中国心血管疾病 (CVD) 死亡的风险，到 2090 年，人类引起的变暖可能导致高达 90% 的与高温相关的 CVD 死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Climate-change-predicted-to-spike-cardiovian-deaths-in-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Climate-change-predicted-to-spike-cardioangio-deaths-in-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=053339f6-361b-463f-b478-9e0ab0fd88ff Sun, 21 Apr 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Climate change predicted to spike cardiovascular deaths in China
大数据推动可穿戴技术：新研究增强了身体活动跟踪研究人员利用英国生物银行的大规模未标记数据集来训练深度学习模型，通过可穿戴设备准确监测身体活动，证明了跨不同环境和设备的准确性和通用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Big-data-boosts-wearable-tech-New-study-enhances-physical-activity-tracking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Big-data-boosts-wearable-tech-New-study-enhances-physical-activity-tracking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=739ea901-e438-40d3-b0f3-ed3ee35b1666 Sun, 21 Apr 2024 22:09:00 -0400 Big data boosts wearable tech: New study enhances physical activity tracking
20年来心房颤动风险不断上升的趋势加剧了人们对相关心脏和中风并发症的关注研究表明，终生心房颤动的风险不断增加，二十年来心力衰竭和中风的风险显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Rising-trend-in-atrial-fibrillation-risk-over-20-years-heightens-concern-for-lated-heart-and-中风-并发症。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Rising-trend-in-atrial-fibrillation-risk-over-20-years-heightens-concern-for-lated-heart-and-中风-并发症。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9e12f2e-d747-4d79-bc2f-abad5f4f7f79 Sun, 21 Apr 2024 21:53:00 -0400 Rising trend in atrial fibrillation risk over 20 years heightens concern for related heart and stroke complications
研究发现，童年创伤与躯体症状发生率较高有关研究探讨了儿童和青少年的创伤事件与躯体症状之间的关系，发现被诊断患有创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）的人，尤其是经历过多次创伤的人，胃痛和头痛等躯体症状显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Childhood-trauma-linked-to-higher-rates-of-somatic-symptoms-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Childhood-trauma-linked-to-higher-rates-of-somatic-symptoms-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acdf3f40-2cdc-42cd-8484-beb6a108b4c9 Sun, 21 Apr 2024 21:12:00 -0400 Childhood trauma linked to higher rates of somatic symptoms, study finds
十字花科蔬菜可能为炎症性肠病治疗带来新希望研究通过体外、体内和初步临床研究评估了十字花科蔬菜及其生物活性成分在减轻炎症性肠病中的作用，提出了一种有前景的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Cruciferous-vegetables-may-offer-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240421/Cruciferous-vegetables-may-offer-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be204b0-6f51-4c7e-acb3-79dac92cc9d2 Sun, 21 Apr 2024 20:59:00 -0400 Cruciferous vegetables may offer new hope for inflammatory bowel disease management
MONET：新的人工智能工具通过深度学习和文本分析增强医学成像MONET 有助于医疗人工智能 (AI) 开发和实施的关键任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/MONET-New-AI-tool-enhances-medical-imaging-with-deep-learning-and-text-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/MONET-New-AI-tool-enhances-medical-imaging-with-deep-learning-and-text-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=707e23a2-cf5a-4535-a8e1-2cbca210aba6 Fri, 19 Apr 2024 07:22:00 -0400 MONET: New AI tool enhances medical imaging with deep learning and text analysis
新的人工智能工具“TORCH”成功识别未知原发病例的癌症起源使用细胞学组织学进行肿瘤起源分化的深度学习方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/New-AI-tool-TORCH-successively-identizes-cancer-origins-in-unknown-primary-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/New-AI-tool-TORCH-successively-identizes-cancer-origins-in-unknown-primary-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e144fd-ec2e-4570-bbac-fe18f4b28e98 Fri, 19 Apr 2024 07:14:00 -0400 New AI tool 'TORCH' successfully identifies cancer origins in unknown primary cases
研究发现，尽管化学污染物含量较低，但地中海鱼类中的微塑料含量却很高研究人员最近在《食品》杂志上发表的一项研究发现，尽管镉和抗生素的含量较低，但受欢迎的地中海鱼类中却含有大量微塑料，这凸显了持续存在的环境问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Study-finds-high-micro Plastic-levels-in-Mediterranean-fish-despite-low-chemical-contaminants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Study-finds-high-microplasty-levels-in-Mediterranean-fish-despite-low-chemical-contaminants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7e589c-f92b-4542-9a03-73807cd6314f Fri, 19 Apr 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Study finds high microplastic levels in Mediterranean fish despite low chemical contaminants
